::Slayer::

Slayer bares his wolfish teeth, looking down at the hand. A deep 
growl emerges from his throat as Slayer resists the urge to slag this 
female.

"Out of my way, femm," he says rudely, pushing the hand aside and 
continuing after Prebon, toward the war suit.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> She looked at Slayer and noticed he didn't care for her being near 
> him.  She took a few steps back. She looked at Slayer and smiled. 
"My 
> name is Spears, not femme. I'm pleased to meet you." she said in a 
> cheerful voice.  She knew that if this bot was under Prebon, she 
> would have to be nice to him.  She took a few steps forward and 
held 
> out her hand for him to shake. 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Slayer::
> > 
> > Slayer growls as he watches Spears walk up to him and Prebon. For 
> > some strange reason, he hated the femm. It was irrational, but 
> > rationality was irrelevant.
> > 
> > "Master," he says, adressing Prebon, "The femm is asking for 
> orders."
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::Spears::
> > > 
> > > She rested her head on her knees and cried.  She hugged herself 
> > while 
> > > sitting in the corner.  She wondered why she even gave a care 
> about 
> > > Striker.  But she knew that he was gone forever.  She 
remembered 
> > > talking to Prebon and giving herself up for Striker's release 
> > without 
> > > a chip.  She then felt a surge as the chip on her straightened 
> out 
> > > her programs again.  She stopped crying and wiped her face with 
> her 
> > > hands.  She slowly got up to her feet and walked over the door 
> way 
> > > and watched Prebon and Slayer. She smiled and knew that is was 
> now 
> > > her place to serve Prebon and to make him happy.
> > > 
> > > She walked down and went to Prebon.  She smiled and nodded to 
> > Slayer.
> > > "Is there anything that I can do to help Master Prebon?"
